verses.text: \w Why|strong="H4100"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H4100"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w far|strong="H7350"\w* \w off|strong="H7350"\w*? \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H4100"\w* \w hide|strong="H5956"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w times|strong="H6256"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*?

\w In|strong="H6041"\w* \w pride|strong="H1346"\w* \w the|strong="H8610"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w pursue|strong="H1814"\w* \w the|strong="H8610"\w* \w needy|strong="H6041"\w*; let \w them|strong="H8610"\w* \w be|strong="H7563"\w* \w caught|strong="H8610"\w* \w in|strong="H6041"\w* \w the|strong="H8610"\w* \w schemes|strong="H4209"\w* \w they|strong="H2098"\w* \w devise|strong="H2803"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w man|strong="H7563"\w* \w boasts|strong="H1984"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* cravings \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H5315"\w*; \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w blesses|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w greedy|strong="H1214"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* reviles \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w pride|strong="H1363"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w man|strong="H7563"\w* does \w not|strong="H1077"\w* \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \w Him|strong="H3605"\w*; \w in|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w schemes|strong="H4209"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H7563"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* God.

\w He|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H1870"\w* secure \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w at|strong="H4941"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w times|strong="H6256"\w*; \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w lofty|strong="H4791"\w* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* \w are|strong="H1870"\w* \w far|strong="H5048"\w* \w from|strong="H5048"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*; \w he|strong="H3605"\w* sneers \w at|strong="H4941"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* foes.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* says \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w himself|strong="H3820"\w*, “\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w moved|strong="H4131"\w*; \w from|strong="H7451"\w* \w age|strong="H1755"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w age|strong="H1755"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* am free \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w distress|strong="H7451"\w*.”

\w His|strong="H4390"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w is|strong="H6310"\w* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* \w of|strong="H4390"\w* cursing, \w deceit|strong="H4820"\w*,\f + \fr 10:7 \ft LXX bitterness; cited in Romans 3:14\f* \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w violence|strong="H8496"\w*; \w trouble|strong="H5999"\w* \w and|strong="H6310"\w* malice \w are|strong="H6310"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w his|strong="H4390"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*.

\w He|strong="H4565"\w* lies \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w wait|strong="H3427"\w* near \w the|strong="H2026"\w* \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*; \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w ambush|strong="H3993"\w* \w he|strong="H4565"\w* \w slays|strong="H2026"\w* \w the|strong="H2026"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w*; \w his|strong="H2026"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w watch|strong="H5869"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* stealth \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H2026"\w* helpless.

\w He|strong="H4565"\w* lies \w in|strong="H6041"\w* wait like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lion \w in|strong="H6041"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thicket; \w he|strong="H4565"\w* lurks \w to|strong="H4900"\w* seize \w the|strong="H2414"\w* \w oppressed|strong="H6041"\w*; \w he|strong="H4565"\w* \w catches|strong="H2414"\w* \w the|strong="H2414"\w* \w lowly|strong="H6041"\w* \w in|strong="H6041"\w* \w his|strong="H4900"\w* \w net|strong="H7568"\w*.

They \w are|strong="H6099"\w* \w crushed|strong="H1794"\w* \w and|strong="H5307"\w* beaten \w down|strong="H5307"\w*;\f + \fr 10:10 \ft Or He crouches and lies low\f* \w the|strong="H5307"\w* hapless \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* prey \w to|strong="H5307"\w* his strength.

\w He|strong="H6440"\w* says \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w himself|strong="H3820"\w*, “God \w has|strong="H3820"\w* \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w*; \w He|strong="H6440"\w* \w hides|strong="H5641"\w* \w His|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w never|strong="H5331"\w* \w sees|strong="H7200"\w*.”

\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*! \w Lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*! \w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H5375"\w* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* helpless.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w has|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w man|strong="H7563"\w* renounced \w God|strong="H3808"\w*? \w He|strong="H3808"\w* says \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w himself|strong="H3820"\w*, “\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H7563"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* call \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w account|strong="H5921"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w regarded|strong="H7200"\w* \w trouble|strong="H5999"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w grief|strong="H3708"\w*; \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w repay|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w Your|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*. \w The|strong="H5921"\w* victim \w entrusts|strong="H5800"\w* \w himself|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*; \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w helper|strong="H5826"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*.

\w Break|strong="H7665"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \w of|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w and|strong="H7665"\w* \w evildoer|strong="H7451"\w*; call \w him|strong="H4672"\w* \w to|strong="H7451"\w* account \w for|strong="H7451"\w* \w his|strong="H7665"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* until \w none|strong="H1077"\w* \w is|strong="H7563"\w* \w left|strong="H4672"\w* \w to|strong="H7451"\w* \w be|strong="H7563"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w forever|strong="H5769"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*; \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* perish \w from|strong="H1471"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* land.

\w You|strong="H3559"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w desire|strong="H8378"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w humble|strong="H6035"\w*; \w You|strong="H3559"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w strengthen|strong="H3559"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w*. \w You|strong="H3559"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w incline|strong="H7181"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w ear|strong="H8085"\w*,

\w to|strong="H3254"\w* \w vindicate|strong="H8199"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w* \w and|strong="H3254"\w* \w oppressed|strong="H1790"\w*, \w that|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* men \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* earth \w may|strong="H3254"\w* strike \w terror|strong="H6206"\w* \w no|strong="H4480"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w*.
